overview: A girl confronts her fears when visitors from another land materialize in the shadows of the night.  “NIGHTSHADE” is a short horror fantasy starring: Jennifer Nangle (That Night, Malvolia: The Queen Of Screams) , Leah Schaefer (Absurd TV), Lexi Marlene (Cold Blooded) and Marle Schaefer (Absurd TV)
title: Nightshade
